Files

mstickerlib/
video.rs

1//! This module deals with translating telegram's video stickers to webp animations.
2
3use crate::error::Error;
4use ffmpeg::{
5	codec::Context as CodecContext,
6	decoder,
7	format::{self, Pixel},
8	media::Type,
9	software::scaling::{context::Context as ScalingContext, flag::Flags},
10	util::frame::video::Video
11};
12use std::path::Path;
13use webp_animation::{Encoder, WebPData};
14
15pub(crate) fn webm2webp<P: AsRef<Path>>(file: &P) -> Result<(WebPData, u32, u32), Error> {
16	// heavily inspired by
17	// https://github.com/zmwangx/rust-ffmpeg/blob/master/examples/dump-frames.rs
18
19	let mut ictx = format::input(file)?;
20	let input = ictx.streams().best(Type::Video).ok_or(ffmpeg::Error::StreamNotFound)?;
21
22	let video_stream_index = input.index();
23	let ctx_decoder = CodecContext::from_parameters(input.parameters())?;
24	let mut decoder = ctx_decoder.decoder().video()?;
25
26	let mut scaler = ScalingContext::get(
27		decoder.format(),
28		decoder.width(),
29		decoder.height(),
30		Pixel::RGBA,
31		decoder.width(),
32		decoder.height(),
33		Flags::BILINEAR
34	)?;
35
36	let mut encoder = Encoder::new((decoder.width(), decoder.height()))?;
37	let mut timestamp = 0;
38	let frame_rate = input.rate();
39	let time_per_frame = frame_rate.1 * 1000 / frame_rate.0;
40	let mut receive_and_process_decoded_frames = |decoder: &mut decoder::Video| -> Result<(), Error> {
41		let mut decoded = Video::empty();
42		while decoder.receive_frame(&mut decoded).is_ok() {
43			let mut rgba_frame = Video::empty();
44			scaler.run(&decoded, &mut rgba_frame)?;
45
46			encoder.add_frame(rgba_frame.data(0), timestamp)?;
47			timestamp += time_per_frame;
48		}
49		Ok(())
50	};
51
52	for (stream, packet) in ictx.packets() {
53		if stream.index() == video_stream_index {
54			decoder.send_packet(&packet)?;
55			receive_and_process_decoded_frames(&mut decoder)?;
56		}
57	}
58	decoder.send_eof()?;
59	receive_and_process_decoded_frames(&mut decoder)?;
60
61	let webp = encoder.finalize(timestamp)?;
62	Ok((webp, decoder.width(), decoder.height()))
63}
